# Rizwan — Developer Blog

> SharePoint & Power Platform development blog with real code, solutions, and tutorials.

imrizwan.com (https://imrizwan.com) is a developer blog by Rizwan, a SharePoint and Power Platform developer. The blog features technical articles with real code examples, screenshots, and step-by-step guides.

## Topics Covered
- SPFx (SharePoint Framework) web part development
- Power Platform solutions (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI)
- SharePoint Online customization and development
- Microsoft 365 development tips and tricks
- React and TypeScript for SharePoint development

## Projects
- SmartCalc: Free online calculators — https://dailysmartcalc.com
- MyCalcFinance: Financial calculators — https://mycalcfinance.com
- Online Image Shrinker: Privacy-first image tools — https://onlineimageshrinker.com
- Legal Policy Generator: Free legal document generator — https://legalpolicygen.com
- OrderViaChat: WhatsApp ordering platform — https://orderviachat.com
